entry.title: 5 PCS | 6"x106" Gold Crinkle Crushed Taffeta Chair Sashes
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2140
Type: Chair Sashes
Price: 4.95

[About]

Quantity: 5 Sashes
Material: Taffeta Crinkle w/ Metallic Shine finish.
Color: Gold
Size: 6" wide x 106" long
Edges: Serged.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.
Buy Sash Buckles

[Information]

Let this exquisite chair sash enchant the entire ambiance of your special event with its seamless luster and upscale look. Blending the modern flair with traditional sophistication, this magnum opus is simply magnificent. Wrap it around your folding or banquet chairs to achieve the excellence of class and vibrancy. The lovely crinkles accented all over the surface coupled with the impeccable metallic glint of lustrous taffeta will impart an imperial sublimity to your party venue and decorations.

Additional Information:

  • Each order is for 5 sashes
  • How to Care: Hang wash, hang dry only.
  • For sashes only, does not include any other decorations.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
